metadata.title: CVE-2021-4435 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: An untrusted search path vulnerability was found in Yarn. When a victimruns certain Yarn commands in a directory with attacker-controlled content,malicious commands could be executed in unexpected ways.

criterions.comment: node-yarnpkg package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
